mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Is Our Command!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this: I stroll into Bank of Entitlement, craving my daily dose of validation. The staff immediately senses my aura of superiority and rushes to cater to my every desire. But then, horror strikes - they run out of my preferred brand of organic, gluten-free, fair-trade coffee beans. My entitlement meter hits the roof! I demand to speak to the manager, who apologizes profusely and offers me a year's supply of the beans as compensation. Ah, the sweet taste of victory! Just another day in the life of a truly entitled individual.
